snippet.title: How Usain Bolt's top speed compares to Michael Phelps, a cheetah, and more
snippet.content:
Usain Bolt may have , but that doesn't diminish what he's done in his legendary career.
Bolt captured nine gold medals during his Olympics career, holds the world record in the 100-meter dash, and set a new standard for what it means to be a sprinter.
The Jamaican sprinter has been clocked at a maximum speed of . We decided to compare this incredible athletic accomplishment to a few animals and other humans to put his power into perspective.
